title: PHPlibxml_use_internal_errors()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPlibxml_use_internal_errors()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Enable user error handling:
<?php
libxml_use_internal_errors(true)
?>
Definition and Usage
The libxml_use_internal_errors() function disables the standard libxml errors and 
enables user error handling.
Syntax
libxml_use_internal_errors(
user_errors
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
user_errors
Optional. Enable user error handling (TRUE) or disable user error 
    handling (FALSE). Default is FALSE
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns the 
user_errors
parameter
PHP Version:
5.1+
